item.title: Cathie Wood’s ARK Invest Says Tokenized Assets Could Reach $11 Trillion In Next 5 Years
item.description: ARK Invest says tokenized assets could reach $11 trillion by 2030 as stablecoins, Ethereum, and institutions push finance on-chain.

item.title: Bitcoin Breaks Ahead, Ethereum Falls Behind: Ethereum Bull Explains Why
item.description: Bitcoin is at a cycle high while Ethereum is much below. Liquid Capital founder Jack Yi put this discrepancy down to macroeconomic conditions, not a f...

item.title: Bitcoin Environmental Debate Intensifies After New Scientist Labels It ‘One Big Disaster’
item.description: New Scientist’s criticism of Bitcoin’s energy use sparks backlash, with advocates citing data and case studies on cleaner mining models.

item.title: Macro Drag Vs. Smart Money: What Will Drive Bitcoin’s Next Move?

item.title: Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Stays Underwaters While Demand Turns Negative
item.description: Coinbase survey shows rising bear market sentiment as U.S. Bitcoin demand trades at a sustained discount in early 2026.
